flavorText.text:
じかんをこえて　あちこち　さまよう。
セレビィが　すがたを　あらわした
もりは　くさきが　おいしげるという。

じかんを　こえる　ちからを　つかう。
へいわな　じだいにだけ
すがたを　みせると　いわれている。

ときを　こえ　みらいから　やってきた　ポケモン。
セレビィが　すがたを　あらわす　かぎり　あかるい
みらいが　まっていると　かんがえられている。

ときを　こえ　みらいから　やってきた　ポケモン。
セレビィが　すがたを　あらわす　かぎり　あかるい
みらいが　まっていると　かんがえられている。

ときを　こえる　ちからを　もつ。
もりの　かみさまとして　さまざまな
じだいに　きろくが　のこされている。

みらいから　ときを　わたって
やってきた。　きずを　いやし
くさきに　ちからを　わけあたえる。

시간을 넘어 여기저기를 방황한다.
세레비가 모습을 나타낸
숲은 초목이 무성해진다고 한다.

시간을 초월하는 힘을 사용한다.
평화스러운 시대에만
모습을 보인다고 한다.

시간을 넘어 미래에서 찾아온 포켓몬이다.
세레비가 모습을 나타내는 한 밝은
미래가 기다린다고 여겨지고 있다.

시간을 넘어 미래에서 찾아온 포켓몬이다.
세레비가 모습을 나타내는 한 밝은
미래가 기다린다고 여겨지고 있다.

시간을 이동하는 힘을 가졌다.
숲의 신으로서 여러 시대에
기록이 남겨져 있다.

미래에서 시간을 건너
찾아왔다. 상처를 치료하고
초목에 힘을 나누어준다.

擁有能夠穿越時光的力量。
在許多時代都留下了
將牠視為森林之神的紀錄。

從未來穿越時光而來。
能夠治癒傷痛，
也會把自己的力量分給草木。

Il a le pouvoir de voyager dans le
temps. Cependant, on dit qu’il
n’apparaît qu’en temps de paix.

Il a le pouvoir de voyager dans le
temps. Cependant, on dit qu’il
n’apparaît qu’en temps de paix.

Ce Pokémon voyage dans le temps. Les forêts où
il apparaît deviennent prodigieusement luxuriantes.

Il a le pouvoir de voyager dans le temps.
Cependant, on dit qu’il n’apparaît qu’en temps de
paix.

Ce Pokémon est venu du futur en voyageant dans le temps.
On raconte que quand Celebi apparaît, cela signifie que
le futur sera bon et agréable.

Ce Pokémon est venu du futur en voyageant dans le temps.
On raconte que quand Celebi apparaît, cela signifie que
le futur sera bon et agréable.

Il possède le pouvoir de voyager dans le temps.
Il a été considéré comme une divinité sylvestre
à différentes époques.

Ce Pokémon venu du futur soigne les blessures
et donne de la force aux plantes.

Dieses Pokémon reist durch Zeit und Raum.
Bäume und Wiesen wuchern, wenn es in der Nähe ist.

Es kann durch die Zeit reisen, aber es erscheint nur
zu friedlichen Zeiten.

Dieses Pokémon kommt aus der Zukunft und ist durch die
Zeit gereist. Solange Celebi auftaucht, ist der Menschheit
angeblich eine rosige Zukunft beschieden.

Dieses Pokémon kommt aus der Zukunft und ist durch die
Zeit gereist. Solange Celebi auftaucht, ist der Menschheit
angeblich eine rosige Zukunft beschieden.

Es kann durch die Zeit reisen und findet in
Aufzeichnungen aus verschiedenen Zeitaltern
als „Hüter des Waldes“ Erwähnung.

Dieses Pokémon kommt aus der Zukunft und ist
durch die Zeit gereist. Es heilt Wunden und
spendet Pflanzen Kraft.

Este Pokémon vaga por el tiempo. La hierba y los
árboles crecen por los campos por donde pasa.

Puede viajar en el tiempo, pero se dice que solo
aparece en tiempos de paz.

Este Pokémon vino del futuro haciendo un viaje en el tiempo.
Hay quien piensa que, mientras Celebi siga apareciendo, hay
un futuro brillante y esperanzador.

Este Pokémon vino del futuro haciendo un viaje en el tiempo.
Hay quien piensa que, mientras Celebi siga apareciendo, hay
un futuro brillante y esperanzador.

Es capaz de viajar en el tiempo. Su condición de
guardián del bosque ha quedado constatada en
documentos conservados de diversas épocas.

Vino del futuro haciendo un viaje en el tiempo.
Además de curar las heridas, posee la capacidad
de revitalizar la hierba y los árboles.

Questo Pokémon viaggia attraverso il tempo. Le
foreste in cui appare prosperano rigogliose.

Ha il potere di viaggiare attraverso il tempo, ma si
dice che appaia solo in periodi di pace.

Celebi è giunto a noi dal futuro, viaggiando attraverso
il tempo. Si dice che ogni sua apparizione preannunci
un futuro roseo e splendente.

Celebi è giunto a noi dal futuro, viaggiando attraverso
il tempo. Si dice che ogni sua apparizione preannunci
un futuro roseo e splendente.

Ha il potere di viaggiare nel tempo. Documenti
di epoche diverse lo descrivono come divinità
delle foreste.

È giunto dal futuro, viaggiando nel tempo.
Cura le ferite e dona vigore alla vegetazione.

This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.

When CELEBI disap­
pears deep in a
forest, it is said to leave behind an
egg it brought
from the future.

Revered as a
guardian of the
forest, CELEBI appears wherever
beautiful forests
exist.

This POKéMON came from the future by
crossing over time.
It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future
awaits us.

This POKéMON came from the future by
crossing over time.
It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future
awaits us.

This POKéMON came from the future by
crossing over time. It is thought that so
long as CELEBI appears, a bright and
shining future awaits us.

When CELEBI disappears deep in a forest,
it is said to leave behind an egg it
brought from the future.

This POKéMON wanders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the forests in
which it has appeared.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which it has appeared.

forest, it is said to leave behind an
egg it brought from the future.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees
flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

It has the power to travel across time, but it is said
to appear only in peaceful times.

This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time.
It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and
shining future awaits us.

This Pokémon came from the future by crossing over time.
It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and
shining future awaits us.

This Pokémon has the ability to move through
time. Records describing it as a forest deity can
be found from many different eras.

This Pokémon traveled through time to come
from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with
its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.

拥有能够穿越时光的力量。
在许多时代都留下了
将它视为森林之神的记录。

从未来穿越时光而来。
能够治愈伤痛，
也会把自己的力量分给草木。
